articles.description: Former Chelsea boss Thomas Tuchel becomes only the third non-British manager of the England men's team.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel named England manager

articles.description: All the latest as England set to appoint former Chelsea and Bayern Munich coach Thomas Tuchel as their new manager.
articles.title: LIVE: Thomas Tuchel set to be confirmed as England boss - reaction

articles.description: Pakistan host England in the second Test in Multan - follow text & score updates plus radio commentary.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England LIVE: second Test, day two, Multan – cricket score, radio commentary and text updates

articles.description: England "need a manager who can deliver a trophy", says Alan Shearer after Thomas Tuchel is appointed Three Lions boss.
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel: England need manager who can deliver trophy - Alan Shearer

articles.description: BBC Sport analyses the Formula 1 title battle including the factors that may help Lando Norris overhaul Max Verstappen.
articles.title: Formula 1 title race: What does Lando Norris need to do to beat Max Verstappen?

articles.description: Lionel Messi scores his 10th international hat-trick and sets up two goals as Argentina maintain a three-point lead at the top of World Cup qualifying.
articles.title: Argentina 6-0 Bolivia: Lionel Messi scores hat-trick in World Cup qualifying

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Orlando Pride and Zambia forward Barbra Banda, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 award.
articles.title: BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2024 contender Barbra Banda

articles.description: Seven-time Super Bowl winner Tom Brady is "incredibly humbled and excited" that NFL team owners have approved his investment in the Las Vegas Raiders.
articles.title: Tom Brady: Las Vegas Raiders stake approved for NFL legend

articles.description: Centre Henry Slade and flanker Tom Curry recover from injury to make England's 36-man squad for the autumn internationals, but first-choice scrum-half Alex Mitchell is out with a neck problem.
articles.title: Slade and Curry return for England, but Mitchell out

articles.description: Is the FA right to risk criticism for snubbing English coaches to go foreign with proven winner Thomas Tuchel?
articles.title: Thomas Tuchel to England: Is FA right to snub English coaches for quick fix winner?
